resources.string: Visit facebook.com/device and enter the code shown above.
Unexpected error while downloading an image.

string.description: This is a button. It is located on the home page for all games. Tapping this allows the user to share this game as a post on their timeline.
string.name: com_facebook_share_button_text

resources.string: To connect your account, open the Facebook app on your mobile device and check for notifications.
You\'re in control - choose what info you want to share with apps.
